mapper.select: select p.*,d1.name zwwz,d2.name zwqsqk from LEDEN_COLLECT_FOURFINGER p left join sys_dict_list d1 on p.SLZ_ZWZWDM = d1.code and d1.sign = 'DICT_ZHZHWWZ' left join sys_dict_list d2 on p.SLZ_ZZHWQSQKDM = d2.code and d2.sign = 'DICT_ZHZHWQSH' where RYJCXXCJBH = #{id} and SLZ_TXYSFSMS = '0000'
